comments: Great Professor!!! Super helpful. he knows what he is talking about and makes commercial law very interesting. def take him

I highly recommend this professor. If you are familiar with the material covered in class, go over the textbook, and write well, you will do well. He\'s extremely helpful in letting you know what will be on covered on tests and quizzes and designs the course in a manner that encourages you to do the work, learn, and want to come to class.
Great guy really funny, makes the class interesting,text book is huge but useful, not too hard if you go to class and pay attention

Commercial Law. Its boring stuff but he makes class really interesting, i actually WANT to attend his class. Midterm and final are hard, an 82 was the highest grade in the class. Gives a single question quiz before every class to make sure you read the chapter prior to attending class.
Great guy, very clear. Really motivates you to do well. Gives a single question quiz each class on the chapter assigned and both midterm and final are short answer
great teacher, makes everything easy to understand and makes boring info relativly interesting, and he is a fair grader, just keep up with the reading and you can do well
